data.title: Build a cold start time series forecasting engine using AutoGluon
data.description: Whether you’re allocating resources more efficiently for web traffic, forecasting patient demand for staffing needs, or anticipating sales of a company’s products, forecasting is an essential tool across many businesses. One particular use case, known as cold start forecasting, builds forecasts for a time series that has little or no existing historical data, such as […]

data.description: Detectors for block corruption, audio artifacts, and errors in audio-video synchronization are just three of Prime Video’s quality assurance tools.

data.title: TRILLsson: Small, Universal Speech Representations for Paralinguistic Tasks
Enable the visually impaired to hear documents using Amazon Textract and Amazon Polly
data.authors: Jack Marchetti, Alak Eswaradass, Swagat Kulkarni
data.tags: Amazon Polly, Amazon Textract, Architecture, Artificial Intelligence, AWS Step Functions, Thought Leadership
data.description: At the 2021 AWS re:Invent conference in Las Vegas, we demoed Read For Me at the AWS Builders Fair—a website that helps the visually impaired hear documents. For better quality, view the video here. Adaptive technology and accessibility features are often expensive, if they’re available at all. Audio books help the visually impaired read. Audio […]

data.title: A Basic Introduction to Activation Function in Deep Learning
data.description: The activation function in Deep Learning calculates a weighted total and adds bias to decide whether a neuron should be activated or not.

data.title: A Basic Introduction to Tensorflow in Deep Learning
data.tags: Beginner, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python
data.description: Tensorflow in deep learning is an open end-to-end machine learning platform. It's a symbolic math toolkit that integrates data flow.

data.title: Basics of CNN in Deep Learning
data.tags: Beginner, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Image, Python
data.description: In this article, you will learn about some basics of CNN which are a type of feed-forward artificial neural network.

data.title: Learning Robust Real-Time Cultural Transmission without Human Data
data.description: In this work, we use deep reinforcement learning to generate artificial agents capable of test-time cultural transmission. Once trained, our agents can infer and recall navigational knowledge demonstrated by experts. This knowledge transfer happens in real time and generalises across a vast space of previously unseen tasks.

data.title: A Gentle Introduction to Unit Testing in Python
data.description: Unit testing is a method for testing software that looks at the smallest testable pieces of code, called units, which are tested for correct operation. By doing unit testing, we can verify that each part of the code, including helper functions that may not be exposed to the user, works correctly and as intended. The […]

data.title: Lessons Learned on Language Model Safety and Misuse
data.description:
The deployment of powerful AI systems has enriched our understanding of safety
and misuse far more than would have been possible through research alone.
Notably:

 * API-based language model misuse often comes in different forms than we feared
